channel.title: Running on macs
channel.description:
Hi this might be a long shot, Was wondering if someone could help me who has a mac or has knowledge of macs could help me run a client/file.
This is the download:
http://uppit.com/bsuc0ufm8i43/RAHBot2.3.1.rar

item.title: Running on macs
item.dc:creator: @HiddeNAttacK HiddeNAttacK
item.description:
@HiddeNAttacK wrote:

Yea got rah to load but scripts aint working, just says “script stopped” when you start a script.

I upgraded my mac to mountain lion. Have installed java 7. Can anyone get scripts working while using rahbot on a mac?

Read full topic

item.title: Running on macs
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:7, topic:450153”][quote author=Kapitein Bier link=topic=553053.msg4052348#msg4052348 date=1342642343]
I can’t get it to work for you, mac doesn’t like the commands, you probably won’t get it to work unless they create a jar that runs on it own. Pretty much means you’ll need to use the windows version.
[/quote]
Rofl you’re retarded.

@OP if you want im sure i can get it running on TV, just pm me[/quote]

Rofl, i’m just fucking around.

Wanna see it working on Mac?

Read full topic

item.title: Running on macs
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

Your trying to run RAHBot, RSCEmulation bot lol…

I can’t get it to work for you, mac doesn’t like the commands, you probably won’t get it to work unless they create a jar that runs on it own. Pretty much means you’ll need to use the windows version.

Read full topic

item.title: Running on macs
item.dc:creator: @HiddeNAttacK HiddeNAttacK
item.description:
@HiddeNAttacK wrote:

Have any of use got macs to test the file? When i run the mac file terminal opens and says

Last login: Wed Jul 18 20:45:53 on ttys000
/Users/HiddeNAttacK/Desktop/rsc/RAHBot2.3.0/Run\ RAHBot\ (Mac).command ; exit;
HiddeNAttacK-MacBook:~ HiddeNAttacK$ /Users/HiddeNAttacK/Desktop/rsc/RAHBot2.3.0/Run\ RAHBot\ (Mac).command ; exit;
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: bot/Client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: bot.Client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247)
logout

[Process completed]

Then nothing happens

Read full topic

item.title: Running on macs
item.dc:creator: @HiddeNAttacK HiddeNAttacK
item.description:
@HiddeNAttacK wrote:

Woow fast reply thanks, theres a few files in the folder.

The Run RAHBot(mac).command reads:

java -cp .:deob.jar:RAHSleeper.jar:scripts bot.Client

The Run RAHBot(windows).bat reads:

@echo off
REM #####################################################################################################
REM # #
REM # As of version 2.3.0 use flags from the command line to change how rahbot runs #
REM # Follow most flags with a space then the correct arguments #
REM # -ver # Changes the client version #
REM # -w # Changes the client width #
REM # -h # Changes the client height #
REM # -ip String Changes the ip to connect to #
REM # -port # Changes the port to connect to #
REM # -nosleeper Don’t start RAHSleeper at startup, no arguments #
REM # #
REM #####################################################################################################
color 2e
java -cp .;deob.jar;RAHSleeper.jar;scripts bot.Client
pause

Read full topic
